description:
🦠 COVID+? 🦠 This morning I woke up with abdominal pain. I decided to not call in because I hoped it was something I ate and would just pass. The pain intensified with every move I made and radiated all around my trunk; my core muscles became extremely weak and I had a difficult time doing simple tasks. After a nasopharyngeal swab test was performed, I was sent home on a mandatory leave as muscle aches/pain is one of the symptoms of COVID. I must have two negative COVID results before returning back to work.
.
.
.

I’m just hoping it was food poisoning or the stomach flu, but I will be self-quarantining at home for the next week or so 😫🤮👩🏻‍⚕️ Currently feeling a bit better without any other symptoms than a dull, achy pain in my abdomen [image from 05/20]
